data.body:
it's just json diarrhea

instead we should have a nicely color coded, formatted output for each check, with a green checkbox for good, red checkbox for bad.

for itemized problems like corrupt beats - don't list all of them, just show how many.

data.title: make foolery doctor output more pleasant
